f77136d30ffa1db0c8ac0bb00e28b29c (19:17): Are you using Chrome?

f77136d30ffa1db0c8ac0bb00e28b29c (19:19): In Chrome: when you hover over a (non-active) tab it fades to a new color.  When you SELECT the tab the tab changes to the selected state immediately; it does not fade at all.
f77136d30ffa1db0c8ac0bb00e28b29c (19:20): And the tab that was selected before immediately changes to the inactive state (there is no fade to the new color).
f77136d30ffa1db0c8ac0bb00e28b29c (19:20): I'm trying to replicate that behavior.
